The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 27 April is 41,838 (4,842.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 April, there were 132 new confirmed cases (15.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 April, there were 128 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (4 extra cases).
